FSX xHead
 
 
Destination
 
Program FSX  xHead  designed to control the internal chamber in Microsoft  Flight  Simulator  X . The program allows to simulate the inertia of the virtual view as the user moves the camera through the three axes ( X , Y , Z ), store up to five different camera positions. The program simulates the visual and sound effects, arising from the landing gear, flaps, spoilers and spoilers. Management of the program to some extent duplicate control cameras, taken in FSX default.

FSX Weather

A new version of FSX Weather 3.5
 
Program FSX Weather is designed to control meteorological data in the game Microsoft Flight Simulator X. Unlike Active Sky FSX Weather performs better control the weather and the only one in its class includes technology xHead . The program allows to analyze real-time weather information, simulation of air flow and additional weather atmosphere. The program has the opportunity to obtain filtered meteorological data in decrypted form.
 
 
 
Differences in all versions Opportunities
 
FSX Weather allows you to download weather with servers providing METAR, analyzes it for text errors and complements it with additional weather extensions that are present in Microsoft Flight Simulator X. Not compatible with the aircraft company PMDG. Requires FSX SP2
